amendatorysection.para: The county of Hamilton is bounded as follows: Commencing at the southwest corner of township nine, north, of range eight, west; thence east to the southeast corner of township nine, north, of range five, west; thence north to the middle of the south channel of the Platte River; thence west along the middle of said south channel, to the line dividing ranges eight and nine, west; thence south to the place of beginning.
